resources.string: It seems you are using textures from an older version of Minecraft PE. Please run \"Extract original textures with root access\" in the options screen again to update textures.
Unable to gain superuser access - are you rooted?
Successfully set original APK as texture pack.
This feature is not supported in MCLauncher yet.
Thank you for trying MCLauncher. MCLauncher starts your copy of Minecraft Pocket Edition and adds additional features to it through patches, addons, skins, and textures.
Your device runs Android Jelly Bean or newer, so MCLauncher cannot access the default textures. The demo texture pack has been enabled so you can test the launcher.
To get started with MCLauncher, tap the wrench icon at the top of the screen. For more help, visit the Minecraft Forum thread.

MCLauncher has detected a recent crash. Safe Mode has been enabled to prevent further crashes by misbehaving patches. In this mode, all patches are disabled. Do you want to continue in Safe Mode without patches or return to normal patching mode?
Do you want to import this patch?
These patches cannot be patched because they are not in a format that MCLauncher recognizes:
Upgrade to MCLauncher Pro to patch more than 3 patches
Pretty much everything on this page is useless. They are here for troubleshooting bugs.
Allows the application to be loaded as an addon into MCLauncher. This means that this app can access network, storage, and do anything Minecraft PE has the permission to do.
If you are not using an Xperia Play, check this
Change the reported screen density to change size of controls - leave blank to disable
Extract original textures with root access
Backup original APK with root access and set it as the texture pack
A fix to keyboard bugs in the new 0.8.x update
Use old live patching code from MCLauncher 1.0
Turn this on if MCLauncher stopped working after the 1.0 update.
Redirect Realms to third-party server list
"Disable ModPE scripts' access to Android functions, like deleting files and using internet"
Control the player by rotating your device. Requires ModPE Scripts to be turned on.
Show \"Insert text\" option in in-game patch manager
Select .png file to change skin to (will only be visible to you)
Use the built-in version of the Slickcraft texture pack by NathanX
Your ModPE Scripts have been disabled in multiplayer, as they may cause crashes. They will be re-enabled when you disconnect from the server.
An error occurred in a ModPE Script
Do you want to import this ModPE Script?
Enter the ID of the script to import
Do you want to import this script? It will get access to the same resources as your MCLauncher instance, including potentially your passwords and other sensitive information.
Enter the address of the script to import
Upgrade to MCLauncher Pro to patch more than one script at a time
ModPE scripts are not supported on your version of Minecraft PE. Some methods in scripts may not function, or may crash the launcher. Use at your own risk.
has been disabled because it encountered too many errors. Sorry!

"Unfortunately, MCLauncher cannot run on your device as security software on your phone, such as Samsung Knox or SELinux, is preventing live patching.
We are working on a fix for this, but in the meantime, MCLauncher functions are limited to patching .mods and loading texture packs.
ModPE scripts cannot be loaded, and all .mod patches require a restart."
Download skins based on PC username
Do you want to set this skin?
"ModPE Script support is required to take screenshots. You can enable ModPE Script support in the Launcher Options page."
Do you want to set this texturepack?
This version of Minecraft PE is not supported by MCLauncher. MCLauncher will run in safe mode temporarily. Please check for updates to MCLauncher as support may be added in a newer version.
